notesStmt.note: Entry endings marked with a punctus; The fragment contains definitions of rare words or terms in Mishnah, Horayot (the first legible entry: עולה ויורד found in Horayot II 9), Avot, Zevaḥim and Menaḥot (until XI 4 יה"ז); Although numerous copies of Gaonic Mishnah glossary have been found in Genizah, this is the only fragment extant from this section of Mishnah.
